Description:
Offer Microsoft 365 customers a seamless experience for migrating Google Workspace workloads to M365. Through a unified portal page, you can initiate and monitor migration tasks for both Gmail and Google Drive. Additionally, if your Google Workspace tenant has fewer than 1,000 users, you'll benefit from the newly revamped Gmail migration flow, which simplifies the process and guides you through each step.
GA date: March CY2025
Title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Unified Google Workspace Migration
